(MY Magmatron was the Judge from TF:TM so he would know what is happening w=
ith Unicron, but not all.)

::Magmatron::

    Sitting in his command room,=
 he felt a strange new presence. Then is dawned on him. Unicron had created=
 new warriors!
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: KSLawdogg@... 
  =
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, February 09, 2001 7:50 PM
  Sub=
ject: On the Move


  Unicron/Vehement/Sun Crusher/Reflector:




  Unicron=
 lowered his arms, inspecting his handiwork.  He'd gave more power to 
  st=
ronger beings than his current servants, but he wasn't nearly as powerful 
=
  as he had been.  For now.  /ARISE MY DARK WARRIORS.  LET MY GIFT AID YOU =
ON 
  YOUR CELESTIAL PATH/

  There was still a slight pain from the ancien=
t being speaking, though not 
  nearly as much.  Vehement stepped forward, =
looking pretty much the same 
  except for a large black cannon attached to=
 his right arm.

  "Mighty Unicron, what do you require of us?  We are your=
s to command from now 
  to eternity."

  /WE MUST MAKE A TEST OF YOUR NEW =
ABILITIES/

  Gathering enough of courage that had never been in him as far=
 as Reflector 
  could remember, he stepped forward.  The Brotherhood membe=
r waited for a 
  silent second, and spoke.  "Chaos-Bringer, may I suggest =
an attack of some 
  sort?"

  /OF COURSE/

  "A strike against an already =
wounded enemy to keep risk away?"

  /YES.  NOW GO/ As soon ast he booming =
voice had spoke the three upgraded 
  Brotherhood members took flight back =
the way they had came.

        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor
